clinical_study.official_title: DetectAB - Detecting Antibiotics - A Pilot Project

brief_summary.textblock: The secretion of different kinds of antibiotic drugs in sweat is investigated. The concentration and pharmacodynamics of antibiotic drugs in sweat and blood will be compared.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in detection of last resort antibiotic Flucloxacillin in sweat.
primary_outcome.time_frame: sample taken immediately before and 45 minutes after Flucloxacillin application
primary_outcome.description: detection of Flucloxacillin in sweat by mass spectrometry (proof of concept).

primary_outcome.measure: Change in detection of last resort antibiotic Imipenem in sweat.
primary_outcome.time_frame: sample taken immediately before and 60 minutes after Imipenem application
primary_outcome.description: detection of Imipenem in sweat by mass spectrometry (proof of concept).

primary_outcome.measure: Change in detection of last resort antibiotic Vancomycin in sweat.
primary_outcome.time_frame: sample taken immediately before and 5 hours after Vancomycin application
primary_outcome.description: detection of Vancomycin in sweat by mass spectrometry (proof of concept).

primary_outcome.measure: Change in detection of last resort antibiotic Cefepim in sweat.
primary_outcome.time_frame: sample taken immediately before Cefepim application and 2 hours, 4 hours, 6 hours, 8 hours after Cefepim application
primary_outcome.description: detection of Cefepim in sweat by mass spectrometry (proof of concept).

secondary_outcome.measure: concentration (yg/ml) of last resort antibiotic Flucloxacillin in sweat.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: sample taken immediately before and 45 minutes after Flucloxacillin application
secondary_outcome.description: quantification of Flucloxacillin in sweat by mass spectrometry.

secondary_outcome.measure: concentration (yg/ml) of last resort antibiotic Imipenem in sweat.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: sample taken immediately before and 60 minutes after Imipenem application
secondary_outcome.description: quantification of Imipenem in sweat by mass spectrometry

secondary_outcome.measure: concentration (yg/ml) of last resort antibiotic Vancomycin in sweat.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: sample taken immediately before and 5 hours after Vancomycin application
secondary_outcome.description: quantification of Vancomycin in sweat by mass spectrometry

secondary_outcome.measure: concentration (yg/ml) of last resort antibiotic Cefepim in sweat.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: sample taken immediately before Cefepim application and 2 hours, 4 hours, 6 hours, 8 hours after Cefepim application
secondary_outcome.description: quantification of Cefepim in sweat and blood by mass spectrometry

intervention.intervention_name: analysis of last resort antibiotic drug (Flucloxacillin, Imipenem, Vancomycin or Cefepim) in sweat and blood
intervention.description: blood draw (4.7 ml EDTA) and sweat sample taken (Macroduct Sweat Collecting System)

study_pop.textblock: In- patients currently receiving intravenous antibiotic therapy (Cefepim, Flucloxacillin, Imipenem or Vancomycin) at University Hospital Basel/ Switzerland

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adult patients
- Ability to understand the purpose of the study, provide signed and dated informed consent and qualify for therapeutic drug monitoring
- In-patients receiving intravenous therapy with last resort antibiotics Cefepim, Floxapen, Imipenem or Vancomycin for at least 24 hours
- Glomerular Filtration Rate >/= 50 ml/Min
Exclusion Criteria:
- Glomerular Filtration Rate < 50 ml/Min
